definition: a lamp that produces a strong beam of light to illuminate a restricted area, illuminate with a spotlight, as in the theater
details:
noun
- a lamp that produces a strong beam of light to illuminate a restricted area
= synonyms: spot
- a focus of public attention
= synonyms: glare
verb
- illuminate with a spotlight, as in the theater
- move into the foreground to make more visible or prominent
= synonyms: foreground
